import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { fetchJobs } from "../services/api"; import "../styles/Home.css"; import "../styles/JobCard.css"; import heroImage from "../assets/hero3.jpg"; import jobIcon1 from "../assets/job-icon1.png"; import jobIcon2 from "../assets/job-icon2.png"; import jobIcon3 from "../assets/job-icon3.png"; import jobIcon4 from "../assets/logo.png"; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getJobs = async () => { try { const jobData = await fetchJobs(); setJobs(jobData.slice(0, 4)); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching jobs:", error); } }; getJobs(); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{/* How It Works */}

Create a Profile

Tell us about your skills, interests, and experience.

3

Apply & Get Hired

Apply to jobs and get hired quickly.

Popular Job Categories

Driving

Drive for logistics, transport, and delivery companies.

Hospitality

Work in hotels, restaurants, and catering services.

{/* Why Choose Us */}

Why Choose Our Platform?

  • ✅ AI-powered job recommendations

  • ✅ Easy and fast application process
  • ✅ 24/7 customer support

); }; export default Home;
